Interface naval.WorriedSea

public interface WorriedSea
extends Object

getBombedHits()
getBombedMisses()
getHeight()
getOpponent(Navy)
getWidth()
legalMove(Navy, Coord)
Check if a move is legal
placeBomb(String, Coord, Navy)
This is the method that actually detonates the bomb.

getBombedHits 
  public abstract Vector getBombedHits()
Returns:
a copy of the vector of bombs that did hit something.
getBombedMisses 
  public abstract Vector getBombedMisses()
Returns:
a copy of the vector of bombs that did not hit something.
legalMove 
  public abstract boolean legalMove(Navy navy,
                                    Coord pos)
Check if a move is legal
Parameters:
navy - The navy that wants to make the move.
pos - The coordinate where navy wants to drop a bomb.
Returns:
True if the move is legal, false otherwise.
placeBomb 
  public abstract boolean placeBomb(String who,
                                    Coord pos,
                                    Navy aim)
This is the method that actually detonates the bomb.
Parameters:
who - - the one who is firing
pos - - where the shot hit
aim - - the navy it was aimed at
Returns:
true if the bomb did hit the aim.
getOpponent 
  public abstract Navy getOpponent(Navy n)
Returns:
The opponent to navy.
getWidth 
  public abstract int getWidth()
getHeight 
  public abstract int getHeight()
